Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i kit
Reviews.Author: Puller Dawg
Reviews.Content: If I had to do it over again I would buy the camera and the longer lens separate and not buy the package. Cost wise I spent an extra $100 for the tripod, case and other accessories were cheap junk for the most part. I received a Zeikos tripod and Zeikos case with my package. The tripod is flimsy and cheap and the case was OK, not great. The Canon case is much better quality. The 16G SD card was OK for starters (get an extra one just in case) and the extra battery was OK. Stick with the true Canon batteries if you can. The cheap imitations go dead quick and don't have the lifetime of the Canon battery in terms of longevity. There was a card reader that didn't work and some dodgey SD card case that I chucked in the rubbish. Not very happy with the kit, seemed like a waste of money to me.The camera is everything I expected and the 55-250mm lens definitely works well. Went out shooting pics yesterday to get a feel for the camera and lenses and got good results. It's a big step up from my old Fuji S7000 so the learning curve is pretty big. Still it shoots far better pics than I expected and with digital fotos it's easy to delete the ones you screw up.

Reviews.Title: Best available under $1000
Reviews.Author: Jeffery S. Herman
Reviews.Content: A lot of research went into this purchase.  I used two T3i's that belonged to friends and made sure they would work in low-light conditions.  I also reviewed consumer reports, and this was the overall highest rated DSLR under $1,000.  I also used my sister-in-laws 40D.  It is much more rugged, but the photo's aren't really any better.About 1000 photos in, I haven't found anything not to love about this camera.  It has functioned flawlessly.  It has quick point-and-shoot modes or allows you to go as low-level as you wish.  I shoot telephoto in some unusual lighting situations, and I have found that the custom white balance settings work perfectly.  I've been able to take great action photos of night high-school football games using the expanded ISO option.The T3i contains no weatherproofing, so keep that in mind.  Increased toughness would be the advantage to going to the pricier professional-level cameras.  The 1/4000 second shutter speed was fine to stop a hummingbird's wings in action so I can't imagine the typical user needing a faster speed.  The ISO expansion allows you to go all the way to 12500, which is about as far as is practical currently.  It allows decent photos under very weak light conditions.The built in flash isn't that great, but you wouldn't expect it to be.  It's mainly for have-to situations and anyone taking regular flash photos would want a better flash for the hotshoe.  The viewscreen can be tilted to almost any angle, which allows some great shots over obstacles or from waist level.  It's great for photos of the kids when they're playing.  Can easily shoot from waist level and avoid the impish look you can get from photographing down on kids.The only quirk I have found is that the wireless remote (optional) only works from in front of the camera.  It's designed to use when you're helping a person pose or you're in the photo yourself.  Being able to activate it from the rear would be nice for wildlife shots.I didn't buy it for videos, but I was amazed at the quality of them.  Sound is mono unless you buy additional microphones, but that's not why I bought the camera anyway.Yes, I would like to have the 60D, but you just aren't going to beat the T3i for under $1,000.  With a little shopping, you can get the additional 55-250 lens which is wonderful.  The image stabilization works perfectly.  Until I can afford the 60D, I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great T3i bundle
Reviews.Author: Hammernmt
Reviews.Content: I received a lot of coin for Christmas and decided it was time I upgraded from a decent point and shoot to a DSLR.  My niece has the original T1i and I've seen the pictures she takes over the years with it and have always been impressed with their quality and clarity.  After doing a lot of research I decided on the T3i over the newer T4i.  It was 200+ dollars cheaper and from what I read it wasn't going to shoot better pics.  The video is better, but I don't plan on using it for that anyway.  I added a Canon 50mm f/1.8 II cheapo lens to complete the package, so I have 2 good IS zoom lenses and a great portrait lens that can handle very low light and has great depth of field for portraits.You have to understand that the last SLR I had was my trusty old Olympus OM-1, which was totally manual.  A great camera but this thing just smokes it in every way.  It's fast and I cannot believe the quality of the pictures for such a cheap body and lens set.  While it would be great to own a better body and some L lenses I just cannot justify spending all that money on something I do as a very intermittent hobby.  I just wanted to be able to take high quality pics when the opportunity presented itself.Overall this kit is a great starter for someone like me.  Sure the card is only 16GB and it's not a fast one, the extra battery seems to have less capacity as the original Canon, the tripod is slightly flimsy, the bag is a bit on the cheap side (though plenty roomy for a camera, 3 lenses, cleaning kit, and charger and extra battery), and the other items are not going to be used (card reader - have one on my laptop, screen protectors - cut to size?  Nah that won't look good and is probably unnecessary), I still give it 5 stars since it's got everything you'll need from the get go for around the same price as buying just the body and the 2 IS lenses.  Once I get more into it I'll look to replace the basically freebies with better stuff where I see the need.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i
Reviews.Author: gus
Reviews.Content: Excellent package, good camera, specially the steadyness (I am getting old and my pulse is not so good!), with two great lenses that allows you to work as you like. Good price for a goof camera

Reviews.Title: Finest bundle you can get for Canon T3i
Reviews.Author: Narayana Katpadi
Reviews.Content: Mark my words guys, this is best and most cost effective bundle you can get for Canon T3i.Just the 55-250 mm lens that comes along with camera kit of 18-55 mm itself covers the cost. Rest all accessories are like totally free additions. Sony 16GB SD card is good enough to store lot of pics (you would need another card though for videos). Focus camera was surprising decent and not as bad as other reviews mentioned. Camera stand is weak in design and needs careful handling. There are bunch of other stuff which are useful in this package. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: This was my first time at amazon and I had a great experience, the shipping was free and the pack came to my cousin's house in like 4 days. Everything was alright and I got all the stuff from the kit. The lenses are excelent, the cleaning kit, the memory card, all the kit! The tripod is kinda cheap but it also works. Anyway Im happy with the purchase because it was cheap with all the stuff I've got, If I would have done it in my country I would have expended like 1500$I have a guarantee from Canon, and all the manuals. I am into the photography 2 years ago and Im convinced that the photographer must be great in the composition of a picture but this camera is really helpful and I strongly recommend it.Otherwise the video quality is excelent, but the audio is not that good.. nothing you can't fix with a good external mic.

Reviews.Title: Love this canon t3i
Reviews.Author: KateMM
Reviews.Content: LOVE this camera. I haven't owned anything besides my point and shoot or camera phone in 10+ years and then decided to buy the canon t3i. It's easy to use and I've asked multiple local photographers and they all say its an excellent camera for what I need. I have no intention of starting a photography biz, I just want to take photos of my kids sporting events and portraits as well as landscapes. I still have a lot to learn but this camera takes great pictures and the starter pack had everything I need.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i - great buy
Reviews.Author: R. D. Jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased the package that included both the 18-55mm and 55-250mm lens with an accessory package (camera bag, 16 GB SD card, tripod, extra battery, etc.  The package price was only $10 more than most dealers were selling just the camera with the two lenses.  Generally the accessories were fairly good quality (e.g., Focus house brand camera bag , Sony SD card, spare battery, etc.) and were easily worth $60 to $80.  The Canon T3i performs very well and is certainly one of the best buys in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Good Bundle
Reviews.Author: Anderson Diego
Reviews.Content: People I would recommend this package is very good and functional. Great Camera and all items are good options. If you are looking for a good package buy this one!!!

Reviews.Title: it's wonderful
Reviews.Author: mike ma
Reviews.Content: the price is reasonable.This camera is very convinent.it is enough to trip.I would like to recommend this camera.very good.thank you .

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: leosmom
Reviews.Content: camera is great and takes fantastic photos. The instructions should warn you to format the disc before using, but otherwise everything was fine.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, "Meh" Accessories.
Reviews.Author: Karl Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I'll brake this down by the items in the package-The Camera and Kit Lens: These are the quality I expected from Cannon. Camera is great, shoots awesome pictures. Don't expect the camera to turn you into a pro though.The Zoom Lens: This is great, not sure what people are complaining about for the price. Focus is fine, pretty quick in good lighting - in poor lighting it struggles a little.The Tripod: This was the most disappointing out of the kit. It's cheap, the plastic was molded rough and I honestly don't trust my $800 camera on top of it unless I'm holding on to it. It works, it does it's job but it isn't anything to get excited about. Go spend $50 at a local shop and pick up a nicer one if you really need it.The Bag: Smaller than I expected, but it will fit both lenses and the body in it. This is probably the first thing that will get replaced in the kit just because I'd like a lot more padding for the money it's holding.The SD Card: This is just an OK card, I've already replaced it with a $32 32GB Class 10 card from Amazon. The biggest issue with the card that comes with it is snapping multiple pictures, review gets slow because you have to wait for it to write the files.The SD Card Reader: Already died on me, and was terribly slow the 4 times I used it. Just plug the camera into USB and pull the files off with it, or buy a better reader.The extra battery: The battery is noticeably lighter than Cannons that comes with the camera.  It takes about 1/2 as many pictures as the factory battery, but I don't know of anyone who buys the Cannon batteries as replacements, they cost 3x what the generic battery does. So this is OK, just don't expect it to have the same capacity as the original battery.The DVD: It's OK, and will get you started in learning about what the camera can do. But especially in photography - rules are made to be broken, so don't take it's suggestions as law.The lens cleaning kit: It's there. Just make sure you always use a fresh clean cloth when you touch your glass, its fragile and delicate.Screen Protectors: I don't actually think I got these, that or I lost them/threw them away with the box everything came in. How sad.All in all, I'd probably buy it again. The camera is great, and everything eventually will need to be replaced anyways, so this gets you a decent way to get everything you need to get started quick. I really wish it had a bounce flash with it instead of maybe the tripod though, I would get more use out of it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: lwj
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an older model Rebel. It was still working great and I gave it to my son.We are leaving for Australia for three weeks very soon. It is just what I was looking for to record our trip.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: Came as advertised and takes great pictures I would definitely recommend this if in the market for a new camera

Reviews.Title: AWESOME.
Reviews.Author: Emilee Stevens
Reviews.Content: I loooove this camera! It's so fun to use. Obviously there are cameras out there that are better but this was the most bang for your buck and its my first semi-pro camera so I'm excited to learn to use it. I expect to have it for years and when/if I get better I'll upgrade eventually. It's nice that it comes with all the little things too even though I hardly use them. Tripod is good, not the best quality but super awesome that all these things practically come free with the camera. I went with the T3i because i have friends with t4i and t5i and they said the difference isn't much besides the new touch screen/better video. I'm more concerned with pictures so the new (and more expensive) ones weren't worth it to me.

Reviews.Title: camera with lens good but accessories ok..
Reviews.Author: amit patel
Reviews.Content: Accessories not so good but camera with lens is good the tripod stand is also shaky not so reliable and the extra battery is also not branded but a generic one..

Reviews.Title: Great camera and lenses.
Reviews.Author: Gavin
Reviews.Content: You know the camera and lenses are good. The rest isn't bad either. I was a little worried about the SD card but I got a Sony Class 10 UHS-1. The bag is suitable, the lens cleaning kit is a bit generic but seems to work well and the tripod is functional but a little on the flimsy side. I wouldn't trust it to hold a more expensive DSLR but it works. Overall a great DSLR starter kit but not quite a one stop shop for a pro level setup.

Reviews.Title: Chip did not work.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Powers
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the Sony SD chip provided with the camera did not work. The chip would not work in the camera or in the adapter attached to a computer. I purchased another chip locally and it worked fine in both platforms.Ken Powers

Reviews.Title: T3i camera and bundle
Reviews.Author: Kay Bee "KayBee1600"
Reviews.Content: GREAT package !!!  Love it ... the camera is everything I hoped it would be.  These two lenses can capture most any thing you can dream of

Reviews.Title: first dslr is great
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a dslr for months but could not convince myself to throw down the cost and move on from my point and shoot. I was glad to buy this package! I'm loving this camera and lens. Works perfect!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: CELSO KOBAYASHI
Reviews.Content: Very good: equipment and price. The 2 lenses are complete, stabilized, facilitate at the time to take the picture. I`m pleased.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Adam Sorenson "Adam"
Reviews.Content: Bought this after returning a Fuji X10 which was good but I didn't like the bait and switch from the company that sold it to me. This camera is like the next generation. Lightweight, amazing quality and clarity in pictures. I couldn't believe cameras could give such great pictures. All of the accessories were genuine Canon. Very satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for newbie
Reviews.Author: SantoshBharat Sode
Reviews.Content: The kit is absolutely great. Worth the $'s spent. it has everything (I would say more than what I needed).For beginners who want to learn and excel, I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Shaun
Reviews.Content: Can't recommend the camera enough. Seller provided everything mentioned, and to be honest the only thing I'd change is to purchase a kit with more lenses and such, as the bag and tripod aren't anything to write home about. Other than that, this is a great price on an amazing piece of equipment, bundled perfectly for those wishing to step up to a high quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Jason Hemmerling
Reviews.Content: I've used this camera a lot for real estate, sporting events, and nature.  It has proven to be up to the task for each scenario.  I must admit, I am a novice to the "real camera" world, and it has been very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Stacey LeBeau
Reviews.Content: So impressed with everything in this package! Love the lenses and the telephoto, package arrived quickly too. Impressed with the quality of the bag as well , would highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Package
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera package. The lenses are sharp and clear, the body is lightweight, and the screen is large enough to view even tiny details in your shots, although for much of the time you can use the viewfinder with ease.Please see my customer feedback for positive information about the seller, Focus Camera.

Reviews.Title: Happy & satisfied
Reviews.Author: Mary Joan DeChick
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera so far & it takes pretty good pictures but we are still in the learning mode. So we shall see!

Reviews.Title: Won't purchase again
Reviews.Author: Bob Foster
Reviews.Content: I tried purchasing this camera twice.  Both purchases the camera malfunctioned after a couple days of use. I have been a big fan of Canon products in the past.  After the trouble with these two cameras,I'm having second thoughts.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: Craig L. Luis "venron"
Reviews.Content: We were looking for the T3i, and this bundle gave us a great price and useful accessories. This is a great package for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Gregory Ostrowski
Reviews.Content: Great price for all the goodies.  Got mine from Focus directly and was satisfied with quality.  The SD card was a SONY class 10, which surprised me since I was expecting a cheapo class 4.  Same with the camera bag, some other reviews stated it was cheap, I think it was great, plenty of cushion and very customizable.  Bought it as a gift for someone, all was good quality.  I have been an amateur photographer (have covered many events but not my source of income, just a big hobby) for over 15 years and I have seen plenty of cheapo packages out there, this was not; although not top end it should be good enough for any amateur photographer. Some things like screen protectors (for a flip screen camera) are a bit silly in my view, I would rather prefer a lens brush, blower or even a lens cap bungee band but considering all the other items, it was a great value.

Reviews.Title: What a great bundle package
Reviews.Author: jeannette
Reviews.Content: Very nice quality camera with everything you need to start up ... my daughter wanted to begin a more in-depth photography hobby and researched this product before we invested.  It was everything she hoped for and I was impressed for the price!  The quality of the equipment and accessories is excellent!

Reviews.Title: A Great Deal
Reviews.Author: ChaPa
Reviews.Content: Hard to argue with the pricing as the camera and lens bundle alone is what the big box stores charge. It's all the extras that make this package hard to beat. In a recent insert, this camera was featured at $749 with the lens package, if you wanted a bag and memory card there was an accessory bundle for $59 extra. So, doing some simple math that made that package $809 as opposed to the $759 for this one. That other package did not inlcude a battery , tripod, HDMI cable or cleaning kit. Assigning a simple value of $50 for these other pieces means that one comes out $100 ahead as opposed to buying from national chains.As to the camera itself, it takes amazing pictures. Love the articulating screen. And what speed. If you are concerned about battery life, order some extra batteries and save 50 - 83% lower price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Conway
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this purchase.  This is my first DSLR, and I couldn't be happier with the product that I bought.As far as the shipping, everything came packed very well, with the exception of the camera bag itself.  One of the edges of the strap arrived broken, but it was an easy enough fix to replace with a different strap.

Reviews.Title: I really like!!!
Reviews.Author: Maria de Jesus Moreno Lopez
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with my T3i, still learning all of its features to take better pictures and then buy a better one.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: bvigilant
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  The photo's are so sharp and clear.  Easy to use even for a first time user like me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: LAME
Reviews.Content: Great kit and great camera, takes awesome photos great quality for the price. It's worth buying this kit instead of just the camera. Great starter kit.

Reviews.Title: Canon t3I
Reviews.Author: oa
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. takes good pictures of fast moving objects. perfect for me that i have kids playing sports. The camera buttons are in the good location and options selections can be located quick.

Reviews.Title: My purchase
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I got my order quickly, within shipping time. Although I did not receive my 25 free prints, amazon did work great with me on getting 40$ refunded to my account to make up for it. Everything works great! I love the camera, its a great starter into a dslr. I would like to invest into a better lens, but the ones that came with this kit are good for the money. The bag in kinda cheap, but u definetly get what u pay for. The extra battery lasts longer than the canon one. It's a great buy. People who say otherwise dont know what they are talking about. Lol

Reviews.Title: Intermediate Photo Lover
Reviews.Author: Robert J.
Reviews.Content: Several reviews mentioned that the extra items in this bundle don't make this a deal. If you're just making the transition to digital SLR, imho, this is the real deal. The t3i, and 2 lenses are worth the price - the rest are added bonuses. I already had a good Ambico tripod but everything else is very helpful. I was into film SLRs back in the day with my trusty Yashica and Olympus, but it's a whole new world with digitals. The SDHC card, spare battery, case & cables are all items I would have to add anyway, but they are included. The case I received is "logo'd" as Vivitar, which I thought was strange but it is functional with room to spare. I especially enjoyed the DVD that was included - it's fairly comprehensive across several different cameras but gives a good overview as a supplement to the 319 page manual for the camera. The camera & lenses are wonderful and should cover most situations. I've only taken 240 photos so far and only two bad ones in the bunch. A great camera so far, and it can only get better as I learn more about it. (Good-Bye "point-n-shoot"!)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Liam Russell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for a photographer who has been using Canon SLR camera's for a long time. She really wanted this to get into the Digital SLR Camera's. Well she can't stop saying how amazing the camera is. The bundled Telephoto Zoom Lens is what caused me to go for this bundle over the rest on amazon. If your looking to get one of the bundles and you don't understand why one is so much cheaper. Make sure the bundled Zoom lens is a Telephoto Zoom Lens, if it's not then you know why it's so cheap. You get what you pay for after all.The included camera bag is very nice and has plenty of storage. The Tripod is a good starter, better than nothing. The included SD card is a nice touch, it's good to get started. If the user plans on using the camera to the it's full extent and shooting full HD clips with it then it would be better to get a faster card. The class 10 Sandisk Extreme and Extreme Pro are good cards, the Extreme should be good enough. The battery is a cheapo but it will work in a pinch. The other accessories are alright. They seem a little cheap. Nice to have but don't make the kit a must.Overall this kit is great and was worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i bundle
Reviews.Author: Roland Acoba
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and the cost. It's the cheapest among stores like Bestbuy, Costco. I know very well of the review of Canon T3i i'll just have to find the reasonable price. I'll recommend to buy anything in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: some stuff are missed
Reviews.Author: abdulaziz alamshani
Reviews.Content: hello,I received the canon kit but there are some stuffs not found. they are 16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card, USB card reader and universal remote. I hope I'll get it soon.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: abscott1702
Reviews.Content: Canon is a good quality and name. Accessories was already in the package so I didn't have to play guessing games. I would suggest including lenses filters as part of the accessory package.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Jorge Bajaña
Reviews.Content: producto de buena calidad igual al que se mostro al momento de hacer la compraes un vendedor seguro gracias

Reviews.Title: ooh i love this things
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mp"
Reviews.Content: hey guess what this camera rocks. like, i really like it. its quick and LIGHT. VERY LIGHT. my buddy has a nikon 7000 something and that thing is heavy as a brick. this camera makes me happy for the cost. FOR THE COST. sure if i had 1500 to spend i would get a different camera but for under 600 this thing is great.. really.

Reviews.Title: Good shipping, good products, wasn't a bad experience.
Reviews.Author: Clint
Reviews.Content: The product shipped on time, I think even a little earlier than I expected. Everything came as stated except for the bag, but I sent an email and the company nicely responded willing to send me the correct bag no returns necessary. I also had a problem with the memory card that came with it, but again they helped me out shipping a better one. Otherwise, the camera, lenses, and everything else was perfectly fine (:

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 13 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens - Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Focus Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens + 10pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
